review_text: Wow, fantastic course! The content and teaching style are excellent. However, the audio quality in several sections is noticeably poor, which makes it hard to follow at times. I’d love to see the instructor compensate for this by adding at least 3–4 more projects with improved audio—would be a great way to enhance the overall experience!

Amazing course. Thank you for explaining every minor detail, which is very helpful in understanding everything. Just finished project-1 successfully. The only minor issue is the audio, but it's acceptable to me. Highly recommend to anyone who wants hands-on learning with projects from end to end. I am not a beginner, but I suppose this course is also suitable for those who are.
Excellent course to understand the world of LLMOPS using Kubernetes, it fulfills its objective to understand how to use Docker and native Kubernetes.

This Udemy course clearly guides you through every step of building and deploying a real-world LLM project—even for non-technical learners. The lessons use simple language, hands-on demos, and worksheets to walk you through setup, coding, cloud deployment, and eventual cleanup to avoid extra costs. The instructor explains technical terms with practical analogies, making it easy to understand how AI projects work and how to shut down cloud instances.
